articles.description: Lady Anne Glenconner, who was a lifelong friend of the late Princess Margaret, told BBC Radio 4's Woman's Hour that The Crown is 'so unfair on members of the [British] Royal Family'.
articles.content:
The Crown's portrayal of the Royal Family is 'complete fantasy' and 'so unfair', Lady Anne Glenconner, the late Princess Margaret's lady-in-waiting, has said.
The socialite, 90, who was a maid of ho… [+4834 chars]

articles.content:
